headline: Jim Cramer on Texas Pacific Land Corporation (TPL): ‘It’s A Great Business, But It’s Not Necessarily One That I Want To Recommend’
summary: We recently published an article titled Jim Cramer Listed 20 Best Performing Stocks of the Last 20 Years. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Texas Pacific Land Corporation (NYSE:TPL) stands against the other stocks. Discussing two decades of Mad Money, Jim Cramer took a moment to highlight the top-performing stocks […]
